finders.name: findAllToBeEvaluated
finders.whereClause: where id_author_status = (select id_author_status from author_status where txt_author_status = 'TO_BE_EVALUATED') and dtm_started_following <= ?

finders.name: findFirstToBeEvaluated
finders.whereClause: where id_author_status = (select id_author_status from author_status where txt_author_status = 'TO_BE_EVALUATED') and dtm_started_following < ? order by dtm_started_following asc limit 1

finders.name: findLimitedToBeEvaluated
finders.whereClause: where id_author_status = (select id_author_status from author_status where txt_author_status = 'TO_BE_EVALUATED') and dtm_started_following < ? order by dtm_started_following

updaters.name: resetAuthorsToBeFollowed
updaters.setClause: set id_author_status = (select id_author_status from author_status where txt_author_status = 'FOLLOWED')
updaters.whereClause: where id_author_status = (select id_author_status from author_status where txt_author_status = 'TO_BE_EVALUATED') and dtm_started_following < ? order by dtm_started_following

updaters.name: updateAllToBeEvaluatedToFollowed
updaters.setClause: set id_status_author = (select id_author_status from author_status where txt_author_status = 'FOLLOWED')
updaters.whereClause: where id_author_status = (select id_author_status from author_status where txt_author_status = 'TO_BE_EVALUATED') and dtm_started_following < ?

counters.name: countAllToBeEvaluated
counters.whereClause: where id_author_status = (select id_author_status from author_status where txt_author_status = 'TO_BE_EVALUATED') and dtm_started_following < ?
